page.title: System Security Plan (SSP)
page.content:
System Security Plan (SSP)

3

1. System Identification

System Name: SDA BMC3 Sandbox

System Abbreviation: BMC3-SANDBOX

System Owner: Space Development Agency

Security Impact Level: MODERATE

2. System Categorization

Per FIPS 199, the BMC3 Sandbox is categorized as:

  • Confidentiality: MODERATE
  • Integrity: MODERATE
  • Availability: MODERATE

3. System Description

The BMC3 Sandbox is a development and testing environment for Battle Management Command, Control, and Communications capabilities. It provides a secure platform for prototyping, integration, and validation of BMC3 technologies.

4. System Environment

Deployment Model: Hybrid Cloud (AWS GovCloud + On-Premises)

Service Model: IaaS, PaaS, SaaS

5. Control Implementation Summary

This SSP documents the implementation of all applicable NIST 800-53 Rev 4 controls for the MODERATE baseline.

Complete RMF Flow Diagram

This diagram shows the complete Risk Management Framework (RMF) implementation flow for all NIST SP 800-53 Rev 4 controls applicable to the BMC3 Sandbox.

  2. To view in Confluence, install a Mermaid plugin (e.g., "Mermaid Diagrams for Confluence")
  3. Alternatively, view the source file at: https://mermaid.live

  • Individual control flows for each NIST 800-53 Rev 4 control

page.title: Control Matrix
page.content:
NIST 800-53 Rev 4 Control Matrix

This matrix tracks the implementation status of all applicable NIST 800-53 Rev 4 controls.

Control Families

AC - Access Control

Controls related to limiting information system access to authorized users, processes, and devices.

 AU - Audit and Accountability

Controls related to creating, protecting, and retaining audit records to enable monitoring and analysis.

 CA - Security Assessment and Authorization

Controls related to periodic assessment and authorization of security controls.

 CM - Configuration Management

Controls related to establishing and maintaining baseline configurations.

 SC - System and Communications Protection

Controls related to protecting information system boundaries and communications.

Additional control families are documented in the generated CSV files.

Implementation Status Legend

  • ‚úÖ Implemented - Control is fully deployed and operational
  • üü° Partially Implemented - Control is in progress
  • ‚ùå Not Implemented - Control implementation not started
  • üìã Planned - Control scheduled for implementation
  • üö´ Not Applicable - Control does not apply to this system
